ModMetaData.name: Shrinez
ModMetaData.author: Arti
ModMetaData.description: Patches the built in 25% chance that a newly generated map will contain an Ancient Danger to instead each map has a 100% chance to contain an Ancient Danger. The mod only modifies the chance of Ancient Dangers spawning. Compatible with Map Designer. Disclaimer: This mod was made by using the help of AI and I am not a professional modder.
